Interface Group

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GroupSelf
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGroup, DefaultGroupSelf

    public interface Group
    Represents a group with user members.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns:
        The group unique ID.

      • isPrivate

        boolean isPrivate()
        Returns:
        true if it's a private group requiring approval to join, false otherwise.

      • getCreatorId

        java.lang.String getCreatorId()
        Returns:
        The ID of the user that created the group.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of the group.

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns:
        The group's description.

      • getAvatarUrl

        java.lang.String getAvatarUrl()
        Returns:
        The group's avatar URL.

      • getLang

        java.lang.String getLang()
        Returns:
        The group's lang tag.

      • getUtcOffsetMs

        long getUtcOffsetMs()
        Returns:
        The offset in milliseconds representing the group's timezone relative to UTC.

      • getMetadata

        java.lang.String getMetadata()
        Returns:
        The metadata stored for the group.

      • getMetadata

        <T> T getMetadata(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Type Parameters:
        T - A type parameter for the metadata to decode.
        Parameters:
        clazz - A hint for the type of the class.
        Returns:
        The decoded metadata for the group.

      • getCount

        long getCount()
        Returns:
        The number of group members.

      • getCreatedAt

        long getCreatedAt()
        Returns:
        The UTC milliseconds timestamp when the group was created.

      • getUpdatedAt

        long getUpdatedAt()
        Returns:
        The UTC milliseconds timestamp when the group data was last updated.
